person.persName: Henry Blair Day (Letcher County farmer and soldier)

body.p: A Kentucky farmer and soldier. Lived in Letcher County, Kentucky in 1860. Married twice, first to Marthan Day and on a second occasion to Mary Day. Served as a captain (Co. F) in the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863. Enrolled as a first lieutenant in the Three Forks Battalion (Co. F) in March 1865.
